title: The Amazing Race contestants Alana and Niko defend handsy host Beau Ryan
text:
Fans on Twitter slammed Beau Ryan's awkward habit of hugging contestants as the host on Channel 10's The Amazing Race.

But two of them - Alana and Niko - were more than happy with his handsy ways and defended the the 34-year-old's habit.

The pair appeared on The Project on Tuesday night, after being eliminated during Monday's episode, and said they welcomed the affection.

'We were just so down and we needed it': The Amazing Race contestants Alana and Niko (pictured) defend handsy host Beau Ryan on The Project on Tuesday

Asked what they thought of Twitter 'blowing up' over the hugs, the couple were quick to insist that for them, it was welcome.

'You know what? For us, we liked the hug! We were just so down and we needed that comforting hug to be honest,' Alana said.

Niko agreed, saying that the pair interpreted the hugs as simple kindness which they badly needed.

Huggy bear: It comes after fans quickly noticed that Beau Ryan (pictured) kept hugging contestants as they passed the pit stop at the end of the episode

'We had the worst day ever so the hug was, "OK, thank you, someone is being nice",' Niko said.

It comes after fans quickly noticed that Beau kept hugging contestants as they passed the pit stop at the end of the episode.

On several occasions, a handsy Beau even decided to join in on group hugs between teammates.

Third wheel alert! On several occasions, a handsy Beau even decided to join in on group hugs between teammates

Cringe! Fans immediately took to Twitter to mock Beau's overly-tactile behaviour

Fans immediately took to Twitter to mock Beau's overly-tactile behaviour, with one remarking: 'Is Beau Ryan going to awkwardly hug everyone?'

Another mused: 'Anyone else purely loving host whatever-his-name-is forcing his awkward hugs upon every team that reaches the pit stops??

'Like.... he's REALLY into the hugs....'

The Amazing Race Australia continues Monday at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: Fans on Twitter have slammed Beau Ryan's awkward habit of hugging contestants on The Amazing Race.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
